mapper.insert: insert into V_HIS_MEDICATION (MEDICATION_ID, PATIENT_ID, VISIT_NO, INHOSPITAL_NO, OUTPATIENT_NO, PATIENT_SOURCE, IS_STRUCTURING, DRUG_NAME, DRUG_UNITS, DRUG_USAGE, DRUG_DOSAGE, MEDICATION_DATE, MEDICATION_TEXT) values (#{medicationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inhospitalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outpatientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isStructuring,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugDosage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{medicationText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update V_HIS_MEDICATION set PATIENT_ID = #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VISIT_NO = #{visitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INHOSPITAL_NO = #{inhospitalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUTPATIENT_NO = #{outpatientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATIENT_SOURCE = #{patientSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_STRUCTURING = #{isStructuring,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRUG_NAME = #{drugName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRUG_UNITS = #{drugUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRUG_USAGE = #{drugUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRUG_DOSAGE = #{drugDosage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEDICATION_DATE = #{medicationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MEDICATION_TEXT = #{medicationText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where MEDICATION_ID = #{medicationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select MEDICATION_ID, PATIENT_ID, VISIT_NO, INHOSPITAL_NO, OUTPATIENT_NO, PATIENT_SOURCE, IS_STRUCTURING, DRUG_NAME, DRUG_UNITS, DRUG_USAGE, DRUG_DOSAGE, MEDICATION_DATE, MEDICATION_TEXT from V_HIS_MEDICATION where MEDICATION_ID = #{medicationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select MEDICATION_ID, PATIENT_ID, VISIT_NO, INHOSPITAL_NO, OUTPATIENT_NO, PATIENT_SOURCE, IS_STRUCTURING, DRUG_NAME, DRUG_UNITS, DRUG_USAGE, DRUG_DOSAGE, MEDICATION_DATE, MEDICATION_TEXT from V_HIS_MEDICATION
